```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

**Read in data**

```{r}
data = read.csv("./data_ML.csv")
```

**Extract attributes related to fighters' fighting style**

```{r}
fighting_stats_col = 3:16
fighting_stats = data[, fighting_stats_col]
```

**Import required packages**

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(cluster)
library(factoextra)
library(dendextend)
library(stats)
```

**Standardize the data for clustering**

```{r}
fight_stats = scale(fighting_stats)
```

**Hierarchical clustering**

```{r, results='hold'}
# Complete
hc1 = agnes(fight_stats, method = "complete")
hc1$ac
pltree(hc1, cex=0.6, main = "Dendogram of agnes (complete)")
```

```{r}
# Ward
hc2 = agnes(fight_stats, method = "ward")
hc2$ac
pltree(hc2, cex=0.6, main = "Dendogram of agnes (ward)")
```
